description: AI RAG app with document Q&A and Stripe billing

changelog.2.0.0: Initial release with chat + billing functionality
changelog.2.0.1: Improved video processing reliability. Incorporated parallel video processing.
changelog.2.0.2: Fix docling offline model support issue.
changelog.2.0.3: Fix document chunking tokenizer issue on large pdfs.
changelog.2.0.4: Add Windsurf and Claude Code rule variants.
changelog.2.0.5: Enhanced text file processing with LangChain semantic chunking and encoding detection.
changelog.2.0.6: Add MCP support for context7 and time in mcp.json for Claude Code.
changelog.2.0.8: Windows-Compatible Template Update Workflow + markdown validation on windows.
changelog.2.0.9: Add Claude command support for all prep and dev templates
